name: Scrap Shooters
description:
Scrap Shooters is an Arena TPS that take place in a post-apocalyptic futur populated by antropomorphes animals and where the main resource is became the scrap.

In this world where reigns the law of the biggest gun, everyone want to show his fire-power and take part in great tournamants all around the world, hoping to acquire wealth and stay alive.

Will you take your chance ?
